document.full_text: disgraced former illinois governor rod blagojevich goes on trial on wednesday for a second time on charges he sold his office, including attempts to sell president barack obama's vacant senate seat.
document.title: ex-illinois governor blagojevich faces second corruption trial
lines_and_colors: disgraced former illinois governor rod blagojevich goes on trial on wednesday for a second time on charges he sold his office, including attempts to sell president barack obama's vacant senate seat.
